title: Ginger cake
directions: Grease and line a 1kg loaf tin with greaseproof paper.
Melt butter, sugar and syrup in a pan on a low heat. Mix so the sugar melts into the butter and syrup.
Remove from the heat and add the milk. Blend until smooth.
Add the eggs and mix in.
Finally fold in the flour, ginger and bicarbonate of soda.
Pour into the tin and cook for 1 hour then cover with greaseproof paper and bake for a further 30 minutes.
